org.mixare.mgr.downloader

Interface DownloadManager


  • public interface DownloadManager
    This class establishes a connection and downloads the data for each entry in its todo list one after another.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DownloadManager.DownloadManagerState
      Possible state of this Manager
